meanings.definition: A closely woven cotton fabric used for bed sheets.
meanings.sent1: I love the softness of percale against my skin.
meanings.sent2: She bought a set of percale sheets for her new bed.
meanings.sent3: The percale sheets whispered sweet dreams to her every night.
meanings.sent4: The percale fabric was a smooth ocean of comfort.
meanings.sent5: The percale sheets felt like a gentle hug from a cloud.
